Class Edge<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ginsim.core.graph.Edge<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the node type
    All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DecisionOnEdge, DynamicEdge, RegulatoryMultiEdge, TrapSpaceInclusion, TreeEdge
    public class Edge<V>
extends Object
implements ToolTipsable
    Base class for all edges: store the source and target nodes.
    Author:
    Lionel Spinelli, Aurelien Naldi
